content:
Roginiyaam sthree-kartthaavin vasthraagratthil
Sparshichappoll kaarunyam-varshichu; raktham ninnu.
Daivaathmajavishvaasatthaal-saukhyatthe sampaadichaall
Rakshakanavalloduracheythu-dhairyam kolllluka bhee vendaa
Vishvaasam ninne kaatthu-poykkolllluka nee saamodam.

Svayame than kaarunyatthaal-sthambhithane sandarshichu
Paapamozhichamgangallkku thaaneki susthhirasaukhyam.
